faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Welcome to our Frequently Asked Questions section! Here, you'll find clear answers to common queries about eLocalPass. From how to get it to where to use it, we're here to help you make the most of your experience. Dive in and discover all that eLocalPass has to offer!

questions.question: Where can I purchase eLocalPass?
questions.answer: You can get it online at www.elocalpass.com

questions.question: How much does my eLocalPass cost?
questions.answer: The cost will be proportional to the number of days and people who wish to enjoy this benefit

questions.question: Where can I validate my eLocalPass?
questions.answer: On our website, you can consult the list of restaurants, stores, and services where you can enjoy our multiple benefits

questions.question: Is it only for locals?
questions.answer: No, eLocalPass is for tourists who are looking for the experience and benefits of a local

questions.question: Can I use eLocalPass for more people than the registered?
questions.answer: For each visit, an eLocalPass holder is registered, and this benefit is extended only to the people selected

questions.question: Can I transfer the benefits to someone else?
questions.answer: It is valid for a group of registered persons; however, one cardholder must be present each time

questions.question: Do I get discounts at all restaurants in Quintana Roo with my eLocalPass?
questions.answer: No, you can enjoy varied discounts in a wide list of places

questions.question: Do i only need to show QR code to validate my discount?
questions.answer: In most establishments only the QR code will be neccesary, however, we recommed that you carry your ID at all time
